content.text:
# List of presidents of Brigham Young University–Hawaii__disambig_1

The following people have served as presidents of the Church College of Hawaii (1955–74) and Brigham Young University–Hawaii (after 1974). This list does not include presidents of Brigham Young University (Provo, Utah) or Brigham Young University–Idaho.
{| class="wikitable"
|+
|-
! width="160" | Name
! width="120" | Dates of Service
! width="200" | Name of School
|-
| Reuben D. Law
| 1954–59
| rowspan="4" | Church College of Hawaii
|-
| Richard T. Wootton
| 1959–64
|-
| Owen J. Cook
| 1964–71
|-
| Stephen L. Brower
| 1971–74
|-
| Dan W. Andersen
| 1974–80
| rowspan="7" | Brigham Young University–Hawaii
|-
| J. Elliot Cameron
| 1980–86
|-
| Alton L. Wade
| 1986–94
|-
| Eric B. Shumway
| 1994–2007
|-
| Steven C. Wheelwright
| 2007–15
|-
| John S. Tanner
| 2015–20
|-
| John S. K. Kauwe III
| 2020–present
|-
|}
